query.title: Query
query.default: What is the total number of pages containing the keyword 'apple'?

dataset.title: Dataset
dataset.description: ID of the dataset to query.

modelName.title: OpenAI model
modelName.description: The OpenAI model to use. Currently supported models are Gemini 2.5 Flash, Gemini 2.0 Flash, GPT-4.1, and GPT-4.1 Mini.

debug.title: Debug
debug.description: If enabled, Actor provides detailed information with tool calls and reasoning.
